Question
========

De kansvariabele B is binomiaal verdeeld. Gevraagd wordt de kans P(B = 10 ||| n = 15, p = 0.5) 

Answerlist
----------
* 0.1
* 0.15
* 0.94

Solution
========

The correct answer is  0.15
